variables.description: The Availability Zone in which to create the new volume.
variables.name: AvailabilityZone

variables.description: Indicates whether the volume is encrypted. Encrypted Amazon EBS volumes can only be                   attached to instance types that support Amazon EBS encryption. Volumes that are created                   from encrypted snapshots are automatically encrypted. You cannot create an                   encrypted volume from an unencrypted snapshot or vice versa. If your AMI uses                   encrypted volumes, you can only launch the AMI on supported instance types. For                   more information, see Amazon EBS                      encryption in the Amazon EC2 User Guide for Linux Instances.
variables.name: Encrypted
variables.required: Conditional. If you specify the KmsKeyId property, you                   must enable encryption.

variables.description: The number of I/O operations per second (IOPS) that the volume supports. This                   can be any integer value from 1-4000.
variables.name: Iops
variables.required: Conditional. Required when the volume type is                      io1; not used with other volume types.

variables.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AWS Key Management Service master key that is used to                   create the encrypted volume, such as                      arn:aws:kms:us-east-1:012345678910:key/abcd1234-a123-456a-a12b-a123b4cd56ef.                   If you create an encrypted volume and don't specify this property, the default                   master key is used.
variables.name: KmsKeyId

variables.description: The size of the volume, in gibibytes (GiBs). For more information about the                   valid sizes for each volume type, see the CreateVolume                   Size parameter in the                      Amazon EC2 API Reference.
variables.name: Size
variables.required: Conditional. If you don't specify a value for the                      SnapshotId property, you must specify this property.

variables.description: The snapshot from which to create the new volume.
variables.name: SnapshotId

variables.description: An arbitrary set of tags (key-value pairs) for this volume.
variables.name: Tags

variables.description: The volume type. You can specify standard, io1, or                      gp2. If you set the type to io1, you must also set                   the Iops property. For more information about these values                   and the default value, see CreateVolume in                   the Amazon EC2 API Reference.
variables.name: VolumeType
